Beta Comments: Impressive amount of work done so far, they seemed to have an almost fully working product. They had some extra features they wanted to add on top for their next steps.
Substantial Comments: Speech api. Bootstrap. Mongo. The backend could have been richer: admin api to add sentences.
Security Comments: Using let's encrypt but no secure cert served. Basic authentication, 1 method authorized and good sanitization. Only one cookie flag.
Design Comments: Some REST designs are bad (PUT on a collection)
